issue.title: §[thread.req.timing] wording should apply to both member and namespace-level functions

discussion.p: In , both /3 and /4 talk about "member functions whose names end in _for" and "_until", but these clauses also apply to this_thread::sleep_for() and this_thread::sleep_until(), which are namespace-level functions (30.3.2).

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4640.

blockquote.p:
[…]
-3- The member functions whose names end in _for take an argument that specifies a duration. […]
-4- The member functions whose names end in _until take an argument that specifies a time point. […]
